trans-unit.source:
\n

The Visual Basic compiler uses this class for object flow control; it is not meant to be called directly from your code.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxx Xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx$ xx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Checks for a synchronization lock on the specified type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx x xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The data type for which to check for synchronization lock.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x
